segments.text: Peter , why don't you go outside and play basketball with your friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Mum , I'd rather stay inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't understand why you want to stay at home . It is such a wonderful day today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer staying at home and watching TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't you just finish watching a basketball game on TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but a football game is next .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Peter . You really should go and play ball yourself rather than watching games .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really shouldn't watch so much television .
segments.speaker: S1
